name: Zombie Crisis: Last One Standing
description: Zombie Crisis: Last One Standing is a LAN(local area network) Battle Royale genre game.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win7 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or higher / AMD Radeon HD 6850 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
